info.name: Xolore Techreport Blue
info.description: A temporary blue theme for the new Tech Report site which was launched 7/7/2019
info.additionalInfo:
Adjustments made to make site a bit more compact.
It's a work in progress.
Some issues exist such as spacing gaps in the 2 column article layout and glitchy animations.

---
9/20 update: updated spoilers in comments
---
9/16 update: Restored the 2 column layout adjustment, made comment quotes more readable and adjusted some more colors for icons and text in the comments
9/12 update: Updates to new comments in progress
8/19 update: Condensed comment form spacing a bit and adjusted 2 column article layout for hopefully better spacing
8/08 update: Updated new feature posts
8/04 update: Updated search page to blue color
7/29 update: Changed appearance for VigLink links
7/19 update: Added styling for article page numbers
